name: BINKY X: Binky's Planned Party
description:
If you have the time, please read "onMasterSlaveAndGodotDevelopers" in txt or pdf formats

The tenth in the award winning BINKY Series.

WELCOME... to the future! One year after BINKY I: Binky's House Party... https://gisbrecht.itch.io/binky-i-binkys-house-party https://www.glorioustrainwrecks.com/node/11349 This time, BINKY actually sent invitations! Everyone is here. Enjoy the festivities of BINKY X !!!

B-CONTINUITYFAN: You should play BINKY I first... this is the first BIBKY video game to have a plot element called continuity... this is after the first game, you see.
RUFF-FRIEND29: I don't understand, but i'll play BINKY I right now!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Movement

R - Toggle Automatic Movement

Credits:

Elephant Sprite from Clickteam edited by mno

Music:

The Lawnmower Man (SNES) - First Level arranged by Michael Richardson
